title: When in your life have you ever found yourself doing exactly something you vowed you’d never be doing? - Quora

response.answer_text: 2things and they kind of overlap! I grew up in a small town in California called vacaville, Which if you’re familiar with spanishcliterally means “cow town”. A handful of years after I graduated I started hearing about a band thst came from my old high school…the band:Paparoach. I refused to listen to them…. I liked rock but I was an 80’s Rock kind of girl not this 90’s grunge crap and they came from Vacaville High…they couldn’t be good??!?!!?!?!!!. Lol!!! I vowed to never listen to them! I married a metalhead and refused to listen to http://metal….it sounded horrifying to me and hubby tortured me with it a lot! And I held solid with my no Paparoach vow from 1993 until 2014 when i kept hearing a song on the radio Station my husband was listening to that I liked and Shazam’d it a handful of times…paparoach “where did the angels go?”freaking loved it! Still refused to listen to anything else of theirs lol!So I bought it (oh the horrors! Lol!) then I heard they were playing in Salt Lake City in 2015 which is only a 5 hour drive from our home in Idaho…another band was playing that hubby was geeked about seeing:Five Finger Desth Punch. I bought him meet & greet tickets for FFDP, I got one for Paparoach figuring I could connect with them on the vacaville thing. My VIP was extra crazy. Evayse it was side stage. So I meet them before the show, get a pic with them…get a tour backstage where I proceed to tell them about my vow and then I apologized profusely! The lead singer, Jacoby Shaddix gave me a bottle of water and i got to meet one of the other band’s guitarists(From In This Moment)asked me how the streak was broken so I told him. My side stage pass was really standing at the corner of the stage in the photographers pit!?I was only supposed to be there for paparoach’s set but I charmed the security guys and they brought me back before the opening band…which ended up being my new favorite band (From Ashes To New) got to watch In a This Moment and FFDP FROM THERE TOO….which is how I ended up getting coronavirus from FFDP’s lead singer…obvs not COVID-19 since this was 2015 but it was horrific nonetheless!!! Paparoach comes on stage and goes through their set…they play that song:”“where did the angels go?” And jacoby runs over to me from center stageand give me the double tiger gun move!!I did not cry…but i laughed and smiled big!! :) i loves all bands and joined my husband and daughter in metalhead-vile!!! Lol now we’ve been to over 350 shows since thst one and have even had some bands stay at our house when they’re in town!!! And no, I won’t name them and no, it’s not Paparoach!!! :)
